title: [Extension Proposal] PrimeFaces Extensions

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

I am the owner of [Quarkus OmniFaces](https://github.com/quarkiverse/quarkus-omnifaces) and we realized we have been maintaining too much code in MyFaces Extensions to support PrimeFaces Extensions so we need its own extension.

### Repository name

quarkus-primefaces-extensions

### Short description

Components and utilities for PrimeFaces

### Repository Homepage URL

https://github.com/primefaces-extensions/primefaces-extensions

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- primefaces
- jsf
- faces
- myfaces
- web
...


### Team Members

- @melloware
- @tandraschko 
- @jepsar


### Additional context

_No response_
